verses.verse: And the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and Sadducees <S%G4523><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> up, and testing <S%G3985><s%> Him asked <S%G1905><s%> Him to show <S%G1925><s%> them a sign <S%G4592><s%> from heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

But He answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "When it is evening, <S%G3798><s%> you say, <S%G3004><s%> '[It will be] fair <S%G2105><s%> weather, <S%G2105><s%> for the sky <S%G3772><s%> is red. <S%G4449><s%>'

"And in the morning, <S%G4404><s%> ['There will be] a storm <S%G5494><s%> today, <S%G4594><s%> for the sky <S%G3772><s%> is red <S%G4449><s%> and threatening. <S%G4768><s%>' Do you know <S%G1097><s%> how <S%G1097><s%> to discern <S%G1252><s%> the appearance <S%G4383><s%> of the sky, <S%G3772><s%> but cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> [discern] the signs <S%G4592><s%> of the times <S%G2540><s%>?

"An evil <S%G4190><s%> and adulterous <S%G3428><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> seeks <S%G1934><s%> after <S%G1934><s%> a sign; <S%G4592><s%> and a sign <S%G4592><s%> will not be given <S%G1325><s%> it, except <S%G1508><s%> the sign <S%G4592><s%> of Jonah. <S%G2495><s%>" And He left <S%G2641><s%> them, and went <S%G565><s%> away. <S%G565><s%>
And the disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to the other <S%G4008><s%> side <S%G4008><s%> and had forgotten <S%G1950><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Watch <S%G3708><s%> out and beware <S%G4337><s%> of the leaven <S%G2219><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and Sadducees. <S%G4523><s%>"
And they began to discuss <S%G1260><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "[It is] because <S%G3754><s%> we took <S%G2983><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>"

But Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> aware <S%G1097><s%> of this, said, <S%G3004><s%> "You men <S%G3640><s%> of little <S%G3640><s%> faith, <S%G3640><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> do you discuss <S%G1260><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> that you have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> bread <S%G740><s%>?

"Do you not yet <S%G3768><s%> understand <S%G3539><s%> or <S%G3761><s%> remember <S%G3421><s%> the five <S%G4002><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> of the five <S%G4000><s%> thousand, <S%G4000><s%> and how <S%G4214><s%> many <S%G4214><s%> baskets <S%G2894><s%> you took <S%G2983><s%> up?

"Or <S%G3761><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> of the four <S%G5070><s%> thousand, <S%G5070><s%> and how <S%G4214><s%> many <S%G4214><s%> large <S%G4711><s%> baskets <S%G4711><s%> you took <S%G2983><s%> up?

"How <S%G4459><s%> is it that you do not understand <S%G3539><s%> that I did not speak <S%G3004><s%> to you concerning <S%G4012><s%> bread <S%G740><s%>? But beware <S%G4337><s%> of the leaven <S%G2219><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and Sadducees. <S%G4523><s%>"

Then <S%G5119><s%> they understood <S%G4920><s%> that He did not say <S%G3004><s%> to beware <S%G4337><s%> of the leaven <S%G2219><s%> of bread, <S%G740><s%> but of the teaching <S%G1322><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and Sadducees. <S%G4523><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into the district <S%G3313><s%> of Caesarea <S%G2542><s%> Philippi, <S%G5376><s%> He [began] asking <S%G2065><s%> His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Who <S%G5101><s%> do people <S%G444><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> that the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> is?"

And they said, <S%G3004><s%> "Some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3303><s%> [say] John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist; <S%G910><s%> and others, <S%G243><s%> Elijah; <S%G2243><s%> but still others, <S%G2087><s%> Jeremiah, <S%G2408><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the prophets. <S%G4396><s%>"
He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "But who <S%G5101><s%> do you say <S%G3004><s%> that I am <S%G1510><s%>?"

And Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Thou art <S%G1510><s%> the Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of the living <S%G2198><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>"

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are you, Simon <S%G4613><s%> Barjona, <S%G920><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> and blood <S%G129><s%> did not reveal <S%G601><s%> [this] to you, but My Father <S%G3962><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> is in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

"And I also <S%G2532><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> to you that you are Peter, <S%G4074><s%> and upon this <S%G3778><s%> rock <S%G4073><s%> I will build <S%G3618><s%> My church; <S%G1577><s%> and the gates <S%G4439><s%> of Hades <S%G86><s%> shall not overpower <S%G2729><s%> it.

"I will give <S%G1325><s%> you the keys <S%G2807><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven; <S%G3772><s%> and whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> you shall bind <S%G1210><s%> on earth <S%G1093><s%> shall be bound <S%G1210><s%> in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> you shall loose <S%G3089><s%> on earth <S%G1093><s%> shall be loosed <S%G3089><s%> in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>"
Then <S%G5119><s%> He warned <S%G2008><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> that they should tell <S%G3004><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> one <S%G3367><s%> that He was the Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

From that time <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> began <S%G757><s%> to show <S%G1166><s%> His disciples <S%G3101><s%> that He must <S%G1163><s%> go <S%G565><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> and suffer <S%G3958><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> things <S%G4183><s%> from the elders <S%G4245><s%> and chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and scribes, <S%G1122><s%> and be killed, <S%G615><s%> and be raised <S%G1453><s%> up on the third <S%G5154><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>

And Peter <S%G4074><s%> took <S%G4355><s%> Him aside <S%G4355><s%> and began <S%G757><s%> to rebuke <S%G2008><s%> Him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "God <S%G2436><s%> forbid <S%G2436><s%> [it,] Lord! <S%G2962><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> shall never <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> happen <S%G1510><s%> to You."

But He turned <S%G4762><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Peter, <S%G4074><s%> "Get <S%G5217><s%> behind <S%G3694><s%> Me, Satan! <S%G4567><s%> You are a stumbling <S%G4625><s%> block <S%G4625><s%> to Me; for you are not setting <S%G5426><s%> your mind <S%G5426><s%> on God's interests, but man's."

Then <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> "If <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> wishes <S%G2309><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> Me, let him deny <S%G533><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> and take <S%G142><s%> up his cross, <S%G4716><s%> and follow <S%G190><s%> Me.

"For whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> wishes <S%G2309><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> his life <S%G5590><s%> shall lose <S%G622><s%> it; but whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> loses <S%G622><s%> his life <S%G5590><s%> for My sake <S%G1752><s%> shall find <S%G2147><s%> it.

"For what <S%G5101><s%> will a man <S%G444><s%> be profited, <S%G5623><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> he gains <S%G2770><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> and forfeits <S%G2210><s%> his soul <S%G5590><s%>? Or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> will a man <S%G444><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> in exchange <S%G465><s%> for his soul <S%G5590><s%>?

"For the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> is going <S%G3195><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> in the glory <S%G1391><s%> of His Father <S%G3962><s%> with His angels; <S%G32><s%> and will then <S%G5119><s%> recompense <S%G591><s%> every <S%G1538><s%> man <S%G1538><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to his deeds. <S%G4234><s%>

"Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, there are some <S%G5100><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who are standing <S%G2476><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> shall not taste <S%G1089><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> they see <S%G3708><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> in His kingdom. <S%G932><s%>"
